This is the command I used to encrypt the databaseUrl: 
```bash
testTravis (master) $ travis encrypt --com databaseUrl="moobz"
Please add the following to your .travis.yml file:

secure: ""

Pro Tip: You can add it automatically by running with --add.
testTravis (master) $ 
```

see this for the travis output: https://travis-ci.com/bj97301/testTravis/jobs/156522714
